00001 // ORTDC3377tdcDecoder.hh
00002 
00003 #ifndef _ORTDC3377tdcDecoder_hh_
00004 #define _ORTDC3377tdcDecoder_hh_
00005 
00006 #include "ORVBasicRDTreeDecoder.hh"
00007 
00008 class ORTDC3377tdcDecoder : public ORVBasicRDTreeDecoder
00009 {
00010   public:
00011     ORTDC3377tdcDecoder() {}
00012     virtual ~ORTDC3377tdcDecoder() {}
00013 
00014     virtual void Swap(UInt_t* dataRecord);
00015     /* Handling the correct swapping for this record. */
00016     virtual inline bool IsDoubleWordTimestamp(UInt_t* record)
00017       { return (record[1] & 0x02000000) >> 25; }
00018     virtual inline size_t NDataWordsOf(UInt_t* record)
00019       { return (record[1] & 0x0000ffff); }
00020     virtual double ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record);
00021     virtual inline size_t HeadOffOf(UInt_t* record)
00022       { return IsDoubleWordTimestamp(record) ? 8 : 6; }
00023     virtual inline bool HasValidHeader(UInt_t* record)
00024       { return (((UShort_t*)(record))[HeadOffOf(record)] & 0x8000); }
00025     virtual inline bool IsDoubleWordFormat(UInt_t* record)
00026       { return (((UShort_t*)(record))[HeadOffOf(record)] & 0x4000); }
00027     virtual inline bool IsShortWordFormat(UInt_t* record)
00028       { return !IsDoubleWordFormat(record); }
00029     virtual inline bool RecordsOnLeadingAndTrailingEdges(UInt_t* record)
00030       { return (((UShort_t*)(record))[HeadOffOf(record)] & 0x0400); }
00031     virtual inline bool RecordsOnLeadingEdgeOnly(UInt_t* record)
00032       { return !RecordsOnLeadingAndTrailingEdges(record); }
00033 
00034     virtual inline size_t NTDCValuesOf(UInt_t* record)
00035       { return IsDoubleWordFormat(record) ? NDataWordsOf(record)/2 : NDataWordsOf(record); }
00036 
00037     virtual inline UInt_t IthChannelOf(UInt_t* record, size_t i) 
00038       { return (GetTDCLocPtr(record, i)[0] & 0x7c00) >> 10; }
00039     virtual UInt_t IthTDCValueOf(UInt_t* record, size_t i);
00040     virtual bool IthTDCValueIsTrailingEdge(UInt_t* record, size_t i)
00041       { return RecordsOnLeadingEdgeOnly(record) ? false : GetTDCLocPtr(record, i)[0] & 0x0200; }
00042     virtual inline bool IthTDCValueIsLeadingEdge(UInt_t* record, size_t i)
00043       { return !IthTDCValueIsTrailingEdge(record, i); }
00044 
00045     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORTDC3377:tdc"; }
00046 
00047     // for basic trees
00048     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 5; }
00049     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00050     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* record) { return NTDCValuesOf(record); }
00051     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00052 
00053   protected:
00054     virtual inline UShort_t* GetTDCLocPtr(UInt_t* record, size_t i)
00055       { i = IsDoubleWordFormat(record) ? i*2 + 1: i + 1; return ((UShort_t*)(record)) + HeadOffOf(record) + i; }
00056 };
